title: RewardCash Certificate Scheme De-registration - HSBC HK
content:
Beware of Phishing SMS

HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! Learn more.

We use cookies to give you the best possible experience on our website. By continuing to browse this site, you give consent for cookies to be used. For more details please read our Cookie Policy.

Top of the content

RewardCash Certificate Scheme De-registration | Enter details RewardCash Certificate Scheme De-registration | Enter details     

RewardCash Certificate Scheme De-registration RewardCash Certificate Scheme De-registration     

RewardCash Certificate Scheme De-Registration

To de-register from the RewardCash Certificate Scheme, please complete the form, then select 'Submit request'. Your request will be processed within 14 working days.

If you would like to update the card(s) that you want to enrol into the RewardCash Certificate Scheme, please call our Customer Service Hotline at (852) 2233 3000.

Please correct these errors

    Sorry, the form isn't available

    Please try again later.

    Personal details

    Contact details

    Credit card details

    Remark: Please fill in details of any one of your HSBC credit cards that has been enrolled in the RewardCash Certificate Scheme. If you're filling in your HSBC UnionPay Dual Currency Credit Card, please fill in the Hong Kong Dollar sub-account number which is printed at the center of the card, if applicable.
